Megaton is a Mutant created by Veratis from the DNA of the clone Megatron (=
Stolen from Kit Kats base by Fox Fingers) and Necromancer. He transforms fr=
om a huge Dragon to a very large TRex. (Comparison to go by- The T-Rex size=
 of Megatrons first form compared to how big they made his Transmetal form =
in the toy.)

As for what side he's on, I haven't decided yet.

(I don't th=
ink Megatrons at the battle so you must mean Megaton)

Starscream: I read y=
a loud and clear! 
::he flies toward Megaton:: 
Starscream: Megaton! So we =
meet again! 
::He fires his nukes at Megaton

The nukes race toward the Dra=
gon, Megaton fires a beam of ice freezing them. "You know of course what th=
ose missles would have done to the atmosphere, I haven't decided to destroy=
 this world yet so I won't allow you to." His large inset eyes start to glo=
w, he puts his head down and decides to play chicken with the jet. (Just a =
reminder, Starscreams small enough to fit inside Megatons mouth.)

Megaton =
sees Starscream coming his way and starts to laugh. 

  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: JP3884@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday=
, December 15, 2000 10:02 AM
  Subject: Ambush


       Can someone explain=
 this whole Megaton thing to me? Who is he, and 
  what side is he on? 

  =
      Tankkor, with the bot on him, sending bolts of electricity through 
 =
 him, suddenly transforms into his bot mode, sending Endbringer rolling awa=
y 
  from him. As smoke rises out of his armor, Tankkor begins a slow march=
 towrds 
  endbringer, with a slight limp. He raises his right arm and shoo=
ts out a 
  series of pulses at Endbringer, while his internal computer cal=
culates its 
  next move. 

        Paralysis now inhales this bots very sp=
ark. He is so close he can 
  taste the exhaust overload from his mech pump=
. There, suddenly, he see's a 
  whif of the exhaust in midair. In the cold=
 of the artic it appeared to be 
  steam. At least it gave him a chance at =
this invisable foe. 
        "Scather, I should have known." He said, with =
intense reptilian eyes 
  locked on the small exhaust that came and disslov=
ed every few moment. He 
  would have to be quick, He didnt know what the i=
nvisable bot was holding. 
        With as much quickness as he could produ=
ce, Paralysis ripped his 
  pistol from his holster and fired three shots a=
t the exhaust, and then 
  bracing himself for wahtever Scather was going t=
o throw back at him. 

        Rampage yelled in pain as the claws sunk in,=
 his arms released the 
  legs and now he used his crab legs mounted on his=
 back to stab the larger 
  bots claw. Wriggling hard, Rampage looked at hi=
s missle launcher only a few 
  feet away. 
        Inferno dove down, and =
kicked it over to the crab, still in the bizzar 
  dance with the enemy. He=
 gave his hoarse laugh and sent several fire balls at 
  the bot as Ramapge=
 fianally grasped his weapon. 


        Megatron watched the icons from th=
e 3 demensional map. He was going to 
  send reinforcements, Aerostreak and=
 Quasar prehaps... 
        "Quasar, do you think you could help with our c=
urrent situation?" 

        Hell Beast and Gremlin made the returning trip=
 from the large lake. 
  They had recived Megatrons message of the ambush, =
and as they trudged trhough 
  the snow, stumbling on it wouldnt be hard. I=
n the distance they saw the 
  lights of the crossfire, and looking at Grem=
lin Hell Beast nodded. 
        "Load your pistol. We might as well help ou=
t, seeing as if we dont 
  they mountian base is the next target." 
       =
 Guns ready they moved forward to engage. 
        eGroups Sponsor 
       =
